title: Federal Reserve already concerned over Facebook’s cryptocurrency Libra
text: Facebook’s cryptocurrency Libra hasn’t been launched yet, but it’s already giving the Federal Reserve a headache. “Libra raises serious concerns regarding privacy, money laundering, consumer protection, financial stability,” Fed Chairman Jerome Powell warned Congress on Wednesday.

title: Traders discuss how Facebook's Libra coin will impact crypto market
text: Will Facebook's Libra coin cause a cryptocurrency boom?

title: Facebook Inc (FB) COO Sheryl Sandberg Sold $10.7 million of Shares
text: COO of Facebook Inc (NASDAQ:FB) Sheryl Sandberg sold 55,000 shares of FB on 07/08/2019 at an average price of $195.13 a share.

title: Dow Jones Futures: Facebook, Amazon, Apple Lead Stock Market Rally After Fed Chief Powell Gives Green Light
text: Stock futures: Facebook, Amazon, Apple, Microsoft and Google led on Fed chief Jerome Powell's green light. That's bullish for the stock market rally.

text: The Federal Reserve is looking into Libra, a report says.

title: U.S. to probe French plan to tax tech companies: source
text: U.S. President Donald Trump will order an investigation into France's planned tax on technology companies that could potentially lead to the United States imposing new tariffs or other trade restrictions, a source briefed on the matter said Wednesday.

title: Fed chief calls for Facebook to halt Libra project until concerns addressed
text: U.S. Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell said on Wednesday that Facebook's  plan to build a digital currency called Libra "cannot go forward" until serious concerns are addressed, comments that pressured the project and dented the price of the original cryptocurrency bitcoin.

title: Fed Chair Raises ‘Serious Concerns’ About Facebook’s Cryptocurrency Project
text: Jerome Powell, the chair of the Federal Reserve, was the latest central banker to express skepticism about Facebook’s cryptocurrency plans.

title: The tech industry is starting to doubt Facebook will be able to launch its Libra currency by 2020
text: "I think two years from now we're going to be like do you remember that Facebook thing? Libra?" said Bismarck Lepe, CEO of Wizeline, a San Francisco product development company.

title: Europe's huge privacy fines against Marriott and British Air are a warning for Google and Facebook
text: The EU imposed record fines this week to British Airways and Marriott, marking far and away the biggest fines imposed under General Data Protection Regulation, which was enacted just over one year ago.

title: The Wall Street Journal: White House social-media summit’s likely target: Big Tech
text: A “Social Media Summit” at the White House this week will offer a platform for supporters of President Trump who say they face censorship by left-tilting Big Tech—and a preview of a likely theme in Trump’s re-election campaign.

title: Facebook digital currency plan raises 'serious concerns': Fed chief
text: U.S. Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell said on Wednesday that Facebook's plan to build a digital currency called Libra raises "serious concerns" that merit a thorough regulatory review.
